      • Book

        public Book​(long isbn,
            java.lang.String callNumber,
            int available,
            int total,
            java.lang.String title)
        Creates a book object providing the ISBN, callNumber, available, total and title
        Parameters:
        isbn - ISBN of the book
        callNumber - call number to locate a book after checking it out
        available - number of available book to checkout
        total - total number of the book
        title - of the book
